span.span:
Welcome To The Hollow Rock-Bruceton Central Alumni Page
Location: Bruceton, Tennessee

h3.style: FONT-SIZE: 12px; FONT-FAMILY: Georgia, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0.5em 0px

span.style: WHITE-SPACE: normal; WORD-SPACING: 0px; BORDER-COLLAPSE: separate; TEXT-TRANSFORM: none; COLOR: rgb(0,0,0); FONT: medium 'Times New Roman'; ORPHANS: 2; WIDOWS: 2; LETTER-SPACING: normal; TEXT-INDENT: 0px; -webkit-border-horizontal-spacing: 0px; -webkit-border-vertical-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-decorations-in-effect: none; -webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px

font.span: The CHS Alumni Website was created from information contained in class rosters, class yearbook's or annuals, newspaper articles, obituaries. etc... I do not claim all information 100% accurate. Mistakes are made even in the yearbook's. If you find inaccurate information or mistakes here, please contact me. If you find information published about yourself, or if you want information added about yourself, please contact me. My e-mail address is at the bottom of every page.

h3.style: FONT-SIZE: 12px; FONT-FAMILY: Georgia, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-STYLE: normal; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0.5em 0px

span.style: WHITE-SPACE: normal; WORD-SPACING: 0px; BORDER-COLLAPSE: separate; TEXT-TRANSFORM: none; COLOR: rgb(0,0,0); FONT: medium 'Times New Roman'; ORPHANS: 2; WIDOWS: 2; LETTER-SPACING: normal; TEXT-INDENT: 0px; -webkit-border-horizontal-spacing: 0px; -webkit-border-vertical-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-decorations-in-effect: none; -webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px

font.span: Please help make this site better by sending me information of alumni deaths. Location and approximate year of death would be most helpful in finding an obituary. If you have an obituary please forward it to me. If you have additional pictures, please contact me or forward them to me. If your class is having a reunion, let me know and I will post the information. I will post pictures of the reunion if you send the information and pictures.
